code_rationales.31641: Bronchoscopic photodynamic therapy light application constitutes tumor destruction. CPT 31641 is the appropriate code for destruction by any method.

31641.description: Bronchoscopy; with destruction of tumor or relief of stenosis by any method

value.overall_assessment: Correctly coded as 31641 for PDT light application. No biopsies or other separately reportable services documented.

code_rationales.31641: Debridement of necrotic tumor tissue post-PDT constitutes bronchoscopic destruction. 31641 is the primary therapeutic service.
code_rationales.31625: Endobronchial biopsies were obtained from the treatment bed to assess for residual viable tumor. Separately reportable as distinct diagnostic work.

31641.description: Bronchoscopy; with destruction of tumor or relief of stenosis by any method

31625.description: Bronchoscopy; with bronchial or endobronchial biopsy(s)

value.overall_assessment: Correctly coded. Post-PDT debridement (31641) and diagnostic biopsy for residual disease (31625) are supported.

code_rationales.31641: Bronchoscopic debridement of necrotic debris constitutes destruction/relief of stenosis.

31641.description: Bronchoscopy; with destruction of tumor or relief of stenosis by any method

value.overall_assessment: Correctly coded as 31641 for post-PDT debridement. No biopsies documented.

31641.description: Bronchoscopy; with destruction of tumor or relief of stenosis by any method

value.overall_assessment: Correctly coded as 31641 for post-PDT debridement. Necrotic debris removed but not sent for pathology.
